groups.name: Animals you meet in a yard

easy.notes: Easy categories: 1) familiar animals found as pets or in yards; 2) items you might fetch for a game; 3) everyday kitchenware; 4) common words that end with -er. Near-miss temptation: 'spoon' vs 'bowl' could seem like both kitchen items but they are distinct categories.

groups.name: Words with a shared beginning sounds
Things in a school supplies kit

medium.notes: Medium categories: 1) group words that share the same starting sound to hint a link; 2) combine word parts to form known compound words; 3) basic shapes familiar from drawing; 4) items commonly found in a school supplies kit. Near-miss temptation: 'ballpark' could be mistaken for the sports item group, but it clearly is a compound word here.

groups.name: Things that travel in a line and rhyme with 'line'
Items that come in a set for a game
Natural phenomena you can see in the sky

hard.notes: Hard categories: 1) near-miss temptation would be 'sign' which rhymes with 'line' but 'sign' does not rhyme; the intended group is words that rhyme with 'line' but are actual words. 2) actions category is a 1-step semantic link but kept clear as separate everyday activities; 3) game set items fit together; 4) sky phenomena are broad but chosen to be distinct. Near-miss: 'sun' could be mistaken for a weather term, but it is a sky object.
